input:
On the floor, you see a silver mug, an orange textbook, a brown pair of sunglasses, a turquoise paperclip, and a yellow notebook. What color is the mug?
Options:
(A) red
(B) orange
(C) yellow
(D) green
(E) blue
(F) brown
(G) magenta
(H) fuchsia
(I) mauve
(J) teal
(K) turquoise
(L) burgundy
(M) silver
(N) gold
(O) black
(P) grey
(Q) purple
(R) pink
